problems.title: Maximum Average Subarray I (Sliding Window)
problems.description:
You are given an integer array nums consisting of n elements, and an integer k.
Find a contiguous subarray whose length is equal to k that has the maximum average value and return this value.

Input Format:
First line: two integers n and k.
Second line: n space-separated integers.

Output Format:
Print a single value: the maximum average. Format to 5 decimal places.
hintsList: Think about how to use a sliding window to optimize the solution.
Consider using a frequency map or two pointers to track the window state.
